channel.title: Help with Cache
channel.description:
Hello, for months i am trying to find out about cache, how to place it in the right place so others can actually play it.
What I have done:
Edited server a bit Port forwarded (port checker says its online and I can login into the client) Made a jar client and a webclient (but have no idea how to make webclient work on website) Client is working for me, but when i tried on other pc it didn't. In the case when it stops on loading screen its an obvious cache problem which i need help with.
Client+ source is Aggroth
The help would make me very happy, please help if you can:
Team viewer: 376 388 945 pass: 6548

item.title: Help with Cache

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

If you are still needing assistance with the cache I’ll see if I can get it working for you pm me

item.title: Help with Cache
item.dc:creator: @virus95x virus95x
item.description:
@virus95x wrote:

Hello, for months i am trying to find out about cache, how to place it in the right place so others can actually play it.

What I have done:

Edited server a bit
Port forwarded (port checker says its online and I can login into the client)
Made a jar client and a webclient (but have no idea how to make webclient work on website)
Client is working for me, but when i tried on other pc it didn’t. In the case when it stops on loading screen its an obvious cache problem which i need help with.

Client+ source is Aggroth

The help would make me very happy, please help if you can:
